subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. denied an appeal Monday to restore the eligibility of linebacker Willie Williams at Glenville State College in West Virginia. Williams, 23, a fifth-year senior, was declared ineligible by the N.C.A.A. earlier this month because of transfer rules. Williams will probably transfer to an N.A.I.A. university, where he would be eligible this season.
